TopicTitle: Can you transfer crew without an EVA?

Articles.Content: I know how to transfer Fuel between two docked vessels. Is there anyway to transfer crew between two docked vessels without them putting on a spacesuit and doing an EVA?

In the stock game: No.

With the Crew Manifest mod: Yes.

I asked the same question when I started - and got the same answer :-) Crew Manifest is good as 5thHorseman suggests but there is a newer/better option I think (I'm still using CM) - Ship Manifest allows you to transfer more than just crew so you might want to check that out too.

Currently there is no way without save file-editing (don't unless you know what your doing) so you should get the crew manifest plugin from here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/18-1-kerbal-crew-manifest/
